It was said that the star smiled upon the Viralon Empire when Lustmage’s talent with magic was discovered. With the war in full swing, Lustreign went to great lengths and expenses to keep her daughter’s gift secret and hidden from the Alliance and their spies, and to find a master to teach Lustmage the arcane arts.

Her search was eventually successful. Among the elves, who were famous for their neutrality in the conflicts of other races and having the power to wipe out anyone who dared attack them, was a sorceress who shared the view of humans as inferiors, agreed to teach Lustmage.

Lustmage’s life had been filled with lessons. Learning magic at Synin’s -the elven sorceress- feet, learning basic archery and swordsmanship, and learning to one day rule the Empire.

141212222.content:
Note: this is the Magical Section, so please don’t put any overly physical characters here! Bard, Druid and Magic Knight are as physical as it should get!
If you want to make another set of classes, describe them all out on one page, and leave the second choice open for others to make their own like this page!

Enchantress: It was strange that Lustmage could be so much like her mother and yet so different at the same time. She had all her mother’s talent and preferences for magic: manipulating minds and emotions was easy with or without magic, and she had no qualms about using transformative magic like shrink spells to incapacitate at will. Like her mother, Lustmage dominated those around her, exploiting all weakness and flaunting her powers.
Unlike her mother, Lustmage was not cruel or heartless. Despite all her skills at manipulation, Lustmage remained a kind, loving person who tried to make the lives of everyone around her as pleasant as she could. Even when she was devouring people, she took steps to make the process as pleasurable as possible to her meal! Lustreign had despaired at getting her daughter to be a proper ruler in the castle, and was sending her into battle hoping that the bloodshed and death would make her a little more ruthless.

After all, you couldn’t conquer the world with kindness and love. You couldn’t be such a manipulative and controlling person and still actually want others to have their own happiness. There was no way an enchantress could be understanding and compassionate, so all her powers had to be a fluke, right?

Right?

Caster: There was no denying that Lustmage held great magical power. The problem was, unlike her scheming and plotting mother, Lustmage tended to think in a simple and direct manner. And when a mage thinks in simple and direct manner, spells tends to result in explosions, though fire or property damage may not be involved. Offensive spells were the only magics that Lustmage was good at, and she excelled in powerful and controlled destruction. However, despite all her power and her mother’s coaching, every other type of magic seemed to fail spectacularly in her hands. Because of this, Lustmage had a slightly meek personality, as she didn’t like disappointing her mother.

Things got really weird when Lustmage’s spells backfired. Her transformation spells either created harmless bugs or terrifying monsters (Always the opposite of what she wanted,) her illusions were either pathetic or not illusions at all (Instead of making a door look like section of wall, the door actually became a brick wall,) and her attempts at summoning were either tiny fairies or things even her mother didn’t dare invoke.
Lustmage somehow managed to summon the Colossal Succubus Queen of Lust instead of a minor imp. Thankfully, the Queen was so amused by Lustmage’s incredible blundering (and the tearful pleas of “Please don’t tell Mom!” when confronted by one of the most powerful demons in existence) that she allowed the young centauress access to a portion of her own demonic power. It really just makes things worse for Lustmage, as instant orgies are the most understandable things the demonic energy turns her spells into (sometimes it’s even more random, and not even the queen of lust can figure out why or how it happens). And while the Queen of Lust kept in touch with the young centauress, having an ancient Sex demon as a confidant and friend really didn’t make her life any less embarrassing.

All Lustmage wanted to do was impress her mother, but she feels rather like she’s being treated as a living bomb and is about to be thrown at the enemy…
